speaker: President.
english:
President. I must thank Mrs Sartori, all our fellow Members and the Commissioner for this interesting debate, which I have been ardently following, since I truly believe that ‘bread and roses’ are essential for all of us, both men and women.
The debate is closed.
The vote will take place on Tuesday at 12 noon.
original:
President. I must thank Mrs Sartori, all our fellow Members and the Commissioner for this interesting debate, which I have been ardently following, since I truly believe that ‘bread and roses’ are essential for all of us, both men and women.
The debate is closed.
The vote will take place on Tuesday at 12 noon.
